description: Sunset Resort is a luxurious oceanfront getaway in Bali, offering stunning sunset views, elegant rooms, and top-tier amenities. Guests can enjoy an infinity pool, full-service spa, and high-speed Wi-Fi throughout the property. With its tropical gardens, modern comforts, and easy access to Baliâ€™s attractions, the resort delivers a relaxing and memorable island experience.
